name: places/ChIJ0xYZMk5ZwokRhSa8vNQkQh4
adrFormatAddress: 1427 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: I had a great experience at the new. Facegym on the UES. I walked in and was greeted by the friendly staff, my temperature was taken and everyone was wearing proper PPE which made me instantly feel comfortable. My trainer was also wearing a face shield as well as a mask so I felt comfortable during my entire workout. The trainer was extremely knowledgable in how he was going to exercise my face and as soon as he touched my skin. he could tell the type of pressure i needed and walked me through the entire workout. It was so relaxing I nearly fell asleep during the workout. I love the way they massage out the knots in my face all the stress instantly being worked out. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for their face to have a little extra glow and youth to it.

originalText.text:
First let me say, I traveled from Upstate NY, well over an hour for this experience and I loved the experience!! I’ll be back. I had been researching all the locations for well over a month.
I read all the reviews people left. I am really into reviews. This location has the best reviews not a-lot of talking at all because I wanted to relax and that’s exactly what I received.

If I had to say one thing I didn’t like was that it’s not private. But don’t let that deter you from this wonderful experience. I am getting back into my self care and have spent a lot of money looking for the right place and I am looking no more this is IT!!

The process is relaxing and I enjoyed it, the price is reasonable to me for what I got. Honestly I will do more of the services they offer, I am totally happy. I try my best not to put a price tag on my peace.
Isabella was my coach and she is my forever go to now.
I will definitely be back. Isabella rocks she know what she’s doing. I’m recommending all my people to her and this location.

originalText.text: I had a signature sculpt last week and have gotten so many compliments since! Big difference in my skin. Kelli was amazing. She explained everything since it was my first time.  I love that it's all natural and she gave me so many tips!! HIGHLY recommend for everyone.  Great for special occasions too. I will definitely be back.

text.text: I had a signature sculpt last week and have gotten so many compliments since! Big difference in my skin. Kelli was amazing. She explained everything since it was my first time.  I love that it's all natural and she gave me so many tips!! HIGHLY recommend for everyone.  Great for special occasions too. I will definitely be back.

originalText.text:
This was my first time at FaceGym, I’ve been using their Youth Reformer serum for months now and am obsessed! I have noticed a more even skin tone even over the summer months.

Today I had the Cryo Medi Lift with Edwin and it was awesome! He explained each step and then reviewed products with me at the end so I can continue using at home. I honestly felt relaxed walking out of there, I felt instant tension relief in my cheeks and I do feel lifted. The receptionist was very kind and helpful as well, she was very informative when I asked about various products. This location is great! Will be back for sure :)

originalText.text: I love facegym. My face was glowing for days after my treatment. I’ve done the clean + lift twice now and swear by the results. If you want dewy and glowwwwing skin, you need to try this.
